mean_cn: n. 拍卖；  v. 拍卖
mean_en: a public event at which things are sold to the person who offers the most money for them
sentence: Although about five of us were bidding on the house at the auction, I finally won.
sentence_trans: 在拍卖会上，虽然我们五个都为这栋房子竞价，但最终还是我赢了。
word_etyma: auct=aug抬高，增加 + ion表名词 → auction拍卖
